Identification.LongTitle: Order Respecting the Remission of Income Tax to I.O.S. Ltd. and to Certain Other Taxpayers

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the I.O.S. Income Tax Remission Order.

Definition.Text: Act means the Income Tax Act; (Loi)

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: any corporation, trust, legal or other entity directly or indirectly controlled by or affiliated with I.O.S. as of July 29, 1973, or subsequent thereto or hereafter, including the following:

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: I.I.T., an International Investment Trust, and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: any corporation, trust, legal or other entity now existing or hereafter created by law or otherwise that acquires the assets of any corporation, trust or affiliate or other entity referred to in paragraph (b); (I.O.S.)

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: any person appointed under the laws of Canada or a province as a liquidator, receiver or trustee of I.O.S.,

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: any person, including a director, officer, employee or agent of a corporation, trust, legal or other entity referred to in paragraphs (b) and (c) of the definition “I.O.S.”, appointed by a liquidator who acts as agent or trustee on behalf of any liquidator, receiver or trustee referred to in paragraph (a), and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: any person, ordinarily resident in Canada, who acts as agent or trustee on behalf of any liquidator, receiver of trustee of I.O.S. other than a liquidator, receiver or trustee referred to in paragraph (a). (liquidateur)

Subsection.Text: Unless otherwise provided in this Order, words and expressions used in this Order have the same meaning as in the Income Tax Act.

Section.Text: Remission is hereby granted to I.O.S., any shareholder or unitholder of I.O.S. or to any other person, before payment thereof has been made and before liability therefor arises, of all taxes exigible under the Act that otherwise have or may become payable by I.O.S. or by that shareholder or unitholder or by that person, by reason only of

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the appointment of a liquidator to manage I.O.S.; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the exercise of control over I.O.S. or the taking of any other action in respect of I.O.S. by a liquidator.
